name: df-fldext
body: |- wceq(cfldext, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfield), wcel(cv(s1), cfield)), wa(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cress, cfv(cbs, cv(s1)))), wcel(cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), cfv(csubrg, cv(s0)))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ /FldExt = { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ Field ∧ s1 ∈ Field)∧(s1 =(s0[|`s](Base ` s1))∧(Base ` s1)∈(SubRing ` s0)))}
comment: Definition of the field extension relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Jul-2023.)
